name: Archeo
description:
Become an archaeologist in Archeo. Dig in the ground and find valuable artifacts! Time for excavation is limited!

Your task is simple: dig, buy tools, extract and sell artifacts. Balance your score and time!

Know bug:

Sometimes a tool gets marked as used even though it isn’t, just treat it as broken and buy a new one. Unintended feature, but oh well ;)
